text: Ana Luísa Amaral (5 April 1956 – 5 August 2022) was a Portuguese poet, novelist and translator. She was a professor at the University of Porto. She was born in Lisbon, Portugal. Amaral died on 5 August 2022 in Porto, Portugal from a long illness at the age of 66.Morreu a escritora Ana Luísa Amaral, aos 66 anos ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Portuguese poets Category:Writers from Lisbon Category:Translators Category:European novelists Category:Portuguese academics Category:People from Porto
title: Ana Luísa Amaral
